p: Of particularly note, some of the novel conserved epitopes are discontinuous (Stadlbauer et al. 2019) or even occluded in their native state (Bajic et al. 2019; Bangaru et al. 2019; Watanabe et al. 2019). How one can obtain and immunize against these epitopes remains a big issue. The advantage of synthetic epitope mimetics and de novo protein design may facilitate immunogens design for universal influenza vaccines in the future (Zerbe et al. 2017; Grayson and Anderson 2018).
